text: ovun dedenagen ekiyaka læjjaven yutu va gaman karamin pæmina niyata vasayenma apa veta oba jalaya sæpayu dæ sandaha kuliya obata pirinamanu pinisa mage piyanan obata aradhana kale yæyi pævasuvaya. evita ohu(musa) ohu(ayyub) veta pæmini kalhi (tamage) katava ohu veta pævasiya. oba biya novanu. aparadhakara janayagen oba midunehiya yæyi ohu pævasiya
